metadata.title: CVE-2021-21160 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in WebAudio in Google Chrome prior to 89.0.4389.72allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
